overview: Sofiah who was originally engaged with Kamal end-up falling in love with his childhood friend Harun. While Kamal was pursuing his study Sofiah and Harun get married with one another. Kamal who only knew about this news after finishing his study became heartbroken, but alas still happy for Sofiah. This guilt lead to the crack in Sofiah and Harun relationship. During one of their marital argument Sofiah accidentally killed Harun. Now a convict she lives in prison wile trying to take care of her son.
title: Satu Titik Di Garisan
